content:
GlobalScope Class

In this Article

Represents the global scope.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
public class GlobalScope : Microsoft.JScript.ActivationObject, System.Runtime.InteropServices.Expando.IExpando

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ScriptObject
  • Microsoft.JScript.ActivationObject
  • GlobalScope

Inherited Members

,

Constructors summary

GlobalScope(GlobalScope,VsaEngine)

Initializes a new instance of the GlobalScope class.

Methods summary

AddField(String)

Adds the specified field to the global scope.
GetDefaultThisObject()

Gets the current default scope, which is either the contained object of a with statement scope, or the global scope.
GetField(String,Int32)

Gets a field that has the specified name by searching the scope hierarchy. This method searches only the scope that is specified by the lexical level.
GetFields(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of FieldInfo objects that correspond to all fields of the global scope.
GetGlobalScope()

Gets the global scope by returning a reference to this object.
GetLocalField(String)

Gets the local declaration of a field that has the specified name. This is used at compile time for error checking.
GetMember(String,BindingFlags)

Gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members that match a specified name.
GetMembers(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members of the global scope.
GetMethods(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of MethodInfo objects that correspond to all methods of the global scope.
GetProperties(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of PropertyInfo objects that correspond to all properties of the global scope.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IExpando.AddMethod(String,Delegate)

Adds the specified method to the global scope. This method is not implemented in JScript.
IExpando.AddProperty(String)

Adds the specified property to the global scope. This method is not implemented in JScript.
IExpando.RemoveMember(MemberInfo)

Removes the specified member from the global scope.

Constructors

  • GlobalScope(GlobalScope,VsaEngine)

    Initializes a new instance of the GlobalScope class.

    public GlobalScope (Microsoft.JScript.GlobalScope parent, Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.VsaEngine engine);

    Parameters

    • parent
      GlobalScope

      A reference to the parent object.

    • engine
      VsaEngine

      A reference to the scripting engine.

Methods

  • AddField(String)

    Adds the specified field to the global scope.

    public System.Reflection.FieldInfo AddField (string name);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the field to add.

    Returns

    • FieldInfo

      The new field, if it is successfully added.

  • GetDefaultThisObject()

    Gets the current default scope, which is either the contained object of a with statement scope, or the global scope.

    public override object GetDefaultThisObject ();

    Returns

    • Object

      This object.

  • GetField(String,Int32)

    Gets a field that has the specified name by searching the scope hierarchy. This method searches only the scope that is specified by the lexical level.

    public override System.Reflection.FieldInfo GetField (string name, int lexLevel);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the field to search for.

    • lexLevel
      Int32

      The lexical level to search.

    Returns

    • FieldInfo

      A field that has the specified name.

  • GetFields(BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of FieldInfo objects that correspond to all fields of the global scope.

    public override System.Reflection.FieldInfo[] GetFields (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • FieldInfo[]

      An array of objects that contains all fields of the global scope.

  • GetGlobalScope()

    Gets the global scope by returning a reference to this object.

    public override Microsoft.JScript.GlobalScope GetGlobalScope ();

    Returns

    • GlobalScope

      This object.

  • GetLocalField(String)

    Gets the local declaration of a field that has the specified name. This is used at compile time for error checking.

    public override System.Reflection.FieldInfo GetLocalField (string name);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the field.

    Returns

    • FieldInfo

      The local declaration of the field.

  • GetMember(String,BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members that match a specified name.

    public override System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetMember (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the member to search for.

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • MemberInfo[]

      An array of objects that match the name argument.

  • GetMembers(BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members of the global scope.

    public override System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetMembers (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • MemberInfo[]

      An array of objects that contains all members of the global scope.

  • GetMethods(BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of MethodInfo objects that correspond to all methods of the global scope.

    public override System.Reflection.MethodInfo[] GetMethods (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo[]

      An array of objects that contains all methods of the global scope.

  • GetProperties(BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of PropertyInfo objects that correspond to all properties of the global scope.

    public override System.Reflection.PropertyInfo[] GetProperties (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

      An array of objects that contains all properties of the global scope.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IExpando.AddMethod(String,Delegate)

    Adds the specified method to the global scope. This method is not implemented in JScript.

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the method to add.

    • method
      Delegate

      The delegate to the method.

    Returns

      null in all cases.

    Adds the specified property to the global scope. This method is not implemented in JScript.
